storyInfo: Dreams, pathways, and visions. Dorothy enters the collective will of the test subjects, breaks the Hub of the geometric construct, and personally destroys her own creation.

attributes.content: A long, long time ago, there was a little girl who lived happily in a beautiful town.
One day, a storm brought with it countless black rocks and destroyed her home.
In search of a way to restore her homeland's beauty, she found the courage to set out on a journey.
The legends told of a most-amazing caster who lived in a faraway, marvelous land, and his Originium Arts could make all that is impossible possible.
During her journeys, she met a fowlbeast that couldn't fly and a tin man who was nothing but an empty shell.
The fowlbeast wanted to learn to fly, and the tin man wanted to find its body. They all had different dreams.
To find this marvelous land, they walked for a long, long time. So long, that the fowlbeast shed all its feathers and the tin man began to rust.
'I will give you my wings. With them, you can fan away the dust,' the fowlbeast said.
'I will give you my tin plates. With it, you can make it through the storm,' the tin man said.
The girl wore the fowlbeast's wings and the tin man's plates and flew past the desert and the storm.
She found the caster, only to discover an incoherent madman.
The girl cried in sadness, but her friends were there with her and started to talk to her.
'Thank you. I flew across an insurmountable desert,' the wings said.
'Thank you. I felt the warmth of a body once again,' the tin plates said.
'This has been such a wonderful journey,' they said together.
'In that case, my dream has come true too.' The girl hugged her friends. 'With you here by my side, I now have a new home.'
With the dreams of her friends, the girl set out on a journey again. This time, she did not set out to find a legendary caster.
She had an all-new goal. She would walk far, far away to where no one had ever gone before.
Dorothy, did you like the story Mommy told you?
She hesitated for a while, but it also seemed like the blink of an eye.
She saw green trees and red roses, a bright and beautiful day, as well as a quiet, endless dark night.
She saw a rainbow that stretched across the sky and reflected as smiles on the spectators' faces.
They walked close together, discussing food, weather, and the good harvest.
They saw her too and waved at her.
'Hello, Dorothy.'
'This is a nice place, isn't it, Dorothy?'
'There's an endless supply of clean water and food here... and all the wild beasts have gone away.'
'It's so great to relax here.'
'All the data from those experiments are driving me crazy, though. I'm always afraid that the director might show up out of nowhere.'
'We shouldn't stay here too long, though. A storm might be coming.'
'Don't worry. We know how to deal with those. Otherwise, why would we even have come here?'
'What is there to worry about, then?'
'Haha... That we can't be on our way tomorrow, of course.'
'And we don't know whether we'll ever find another place like this again.'
'It doesn't matter if we run away... tomorrow's still coming.'
'If all I do is hide here, when will I become the greatest scientist there ever was?'
'And that's why we'll be on our way as soon as it's light out.'
'Strange. What a long night this is...'
Nngh—!
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: It's moving more intensely! It's like... it's putting up a fight!
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Perhaps that's because Dorothy is putting up a fight.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Do you believe her? This was Ms. Dorothy's experiment. Would she really willingly abandon a dream she's chased for years?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: What Dorothy seeks isn't success.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If she can really hear the voices of her loved ones... she will make the choice that's most beneficial to them.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I wonder what she sees at this very moment?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Lacking sufficient reliable data.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I was able to feel them, but I did not receive a 'Transmitter' injection.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: One hypothesis is that the Device #9's sensitivity to signals has allowed me to receive fragments of some of the messages.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: But those fragments contained certain specific words.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: They were emotions.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Language is a set of rules for command input and output. It cannot describe every tiny brainwave fluctuation in detail.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: If I must make a conjecture, I postulate that... Director Franks is dreaming.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: She's dreaming...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Whose dream? Is it Dorothy's own dream, or... a collective dream of all the Pioneers connected to the 'Hub?'
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I do not know.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Just like... when I was dreaming, I could not ascertain whose dream it was...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Joyce, your manner of speech...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Olivia...? I... I don't know what's going on...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Is your... device being jammed again?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I don't know either.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Olivia, I feel both sad and happy.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Are we all walking a path to an unknown destination, and a starting point we can no longer see?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I think so... especially for researchers like us.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There is one thing... I've wanted to tell you for a long time.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Device #9 may have given me a lot of pain, and my journey may come to an end at any moment, but...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: It is thanks to your companionship—
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I never once felt alone or lost hope.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Mary, I gotta ask... am I gonna die here?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: If you're free enough to think about that, why don't you try to work a little harder?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Heh... Hah... We don't have too many bolts left, do we?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Before these... well-armed fellas shackle up my neck... while I can still breathe and think freely...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I got something to say.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Then say it. Look at how hard you're panting. Careful not to bite your tongue when you talk.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Haha, I love it when you say things like that.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Ever since I became their boss, they take every word I say as pure gold. It's exhausting.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Mary, I oughta be satisfied enough that... I get to die next to you.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: This isn't how you saw yourself biting it, huh?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I used to think that, it'd be great if I got to go out on a soft bed with my wife and kids holding my hand... and a bunch of letters from the people I'd helped sitting there on my nightstand...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Right, a window... The room's gotta have a window. I wanna see the sunlight one last time.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: When I think that, whether there's a room... or a bed...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: It feels like it's not so important whether I have a wife or kids anymore.
Looks like...
I stopped caring about dying somewhere along the way, a long time ago.
Mommy, isn't a long journey hard? Why didn't everybody choose to stay somewhere safe?
Dorothy, everyone is hanging on because they want to see with their own eyes what the path far ahead holds.
Will I go on the journey with you one day?
Dorothy, you will make your own journey.
Mommy, why are you crying? Is it because you don't want me to leave? I don't have to go to the summer camp if you don't want me to go.
No, Dorothy... Your future doesn't belong to me.
Dorothy, one day, Mommy will stand here and send you off on your journey.
Dorothy, the sights you will see in the future will be like nothing I've ever seen.
Dorothy, why are you crying?
attributes.name: Young Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Don't you like this place?
attributes.name: Young Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: The child stands on her tiptoes and reaches her hand out to try and wipe the tears on Dorothy's face.
Dorothy lifts her hand as well.
And just as she is about to take the girl's hand...
She puts her hand down.
No, my dear friend.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: This is... the land of dreams that I've been searching for all my life.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: How I hope I can find peace and happiness for all of you...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But your futures don't belong to me.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I shouldn't trap you here.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: And I... shouldn't trap myself here.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I will send you off on your journeys...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The sights you will see in the future will be like nothing I've ever seen.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dr. Silence, am I seeing things? Are all the silver liquids... retreating?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: The laboratory...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Why is it suddenly turning around and heading toward the labs?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: If it keeps going, it'll reach...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Right, that's its target... The place it was born.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: With a loud bang, the remaining half of the building suddenly crumbles.
Unlike its previous growth stage, it does not patiently wait to dissolve the crumbled building's structure.
It simply retrieves all the energy and, without hesitation, it tears into its own heart.
The large, geometric construct rapidly crumbles away.
The dust scatters in all directions, and a stream of silver liquid slowly flows on the ground. The sky, too, has returned to its original color.
No...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Impossible.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The data... Show me the data.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The test subject disconnected from the 'Hub,' and its structure completely collapsed...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The 'Hub' is... destroyed?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Mary...?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I'm not dreaming, am I? That monster... is actually gone?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We're saved.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We're saved—Mary, did you see that?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Don't... let your guard down. Huff... We still have the bad guys from Rhine Lab to deal with...
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Wait, are the Rhine Labbers retreating?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Hold on... Who's that...? And are they wearing...?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Director Franks destroyed her own creation.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: She did it...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You believed in her the whole time, didn't you?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Greyy, she said... you have the same kind of courage as the Pioneers.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I couldn't tell her in time that... she was just as brave—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: So brave that she was willing to wake up from the dream she weaved of her own love.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dorothy, how do you feel? Does it hurt anywhere?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I can't say I feel very good, but...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I feel relaxed.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: So... did you find your answer?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Answer?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: No... What I found was a new journey.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: And it belongs only to them.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I... I have another path to walk.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: How does it feel to have your dreams crushed?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Only Dorothy knows the exact location of the 'Hub.'
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Could it really be that Dorothy destroyed the system she created herself...? Can she control this creation?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You can't imagine that, can you?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: That's because you've never considered the possibility that Dorothy would inject herself too—That she would plug herself into that thing.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's not like you saw her do it.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I didn't, but I know her.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Her heart lies with the Pioneers. For them, she would do whatever it took as many times as it took, without hesitation, and she'd choose to stop when and if it became necessary.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I have to find her.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Her research is more impressive than I imagined. Our experiment is not over yet—
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: What's going on? Where are the Defense personnel—
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Director Clooney, the observation station's surrounded!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: On whose authority...? No, it doesn't matter who they are. How did they find out about the site?!
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: My Arts... Finally, it's enough for those control panels you use to disrupt communications. It did take me some time, so I've got to thank you for teaching me patience.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You did it right in front of me...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: If you would just... pay more attention to what's going on around you and listen more carefully when you talk, you could've figured me out.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: They're here, Director Clooney... Ugh!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Rhine Lab Energy Section Director, Ferdinand Clooney.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: We have proof beyond a reasonable doubt that you have violated clinical laboratory regulations and have been conducting illegal experiments at this site.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Surrender immediately and order your subordinates to drop their weapons.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: This is all just a misunderstanding. Please let me make a call.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Not exactly in accordance with procedure, but... knock yourself out.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: The number's not in service...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Who do you work for? I need to talk to the colonel.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Look, I know a lot of colonels who run a lot of regiments. You want to be a little more specific?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: There are countless weapons pointed at him.
The name is frozen on the tip of his tongue.
Suddenly, Ferdinand is relieved that he did not reveal the name to the crowd.
Pick up your comm.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Hahaha...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I get it now, Kirsten.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You won. Congratulations.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: This was never about winning or losing, Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Your bet almost destroyed Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Rhine...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I told you I would build the most fantastic laboratory in all of Terra here, and I did it.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I will ensure that the Rhine name lives on gloriously in the epoch to come.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: And what about you? Do you really care about Rhine, Kirsten?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You don't. You only want to burn all our efforts as fuel for yourself.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: It's for Rhine's sake that you must be stopped...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Rhine Lab doesn't belong to you. It doesn't belong to anyone.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Ferdinand Clooney, you're too easily distracted. Rhine doesn't need an academic like you.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: You came here just to fire me, Control?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I'm reminding you to make the smart choice.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: You mean... accept your proposal to hire a top lawyer and use your relationship with the government to have me locked away in a state prison for two centuries?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: How smart that would be.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Ferdinand—!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: He... He killed himself?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: *cough*... The floor structure here's broken through...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I think he might have escaped, ma'am.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: It's a pain in the neck to catch these smartasses who make preparations in advance... but not like we had much of a choice.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: After him. He won't get far without help.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: It all turned out just as you wanted, Saria.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: The situation has changed... thanks to the message you and Rhodes Island brought here.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Ferdinand failed, and you 'saved' Rhine Lab once again.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I should go.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Saria—
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I don't remember everything that happened all those years ago.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: I noticed that you've tweaked your Arts casting methods. The reconstitution effect your calcification has on matter particles is more complicated and intricate now.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: You abandoned the formula that the two of us developed together in the early days.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: Defense techniques that have been cracked have no value.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: And I was the only one ever to crack calcification.
attributes.name: Kirsten

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Goodbye, Kirsten.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: He hated these preparations.
After all, only losers have to resort to backup plans.
Ferdinand's laboratory has never needed so many plans. After all, he has always had a masterful control of the tides.
Many say that he is a capable businessman, but they don't understand.
He simply stays on the right path and marches on endlessly.
As long as you walk faster than anyone, money and attention will come pouring in.
And with these resources, he can walk faster and farther.
But...
Today, he has no choice but to walk this dark, narrow path. An escape route that he never seriously considered he would have to take.
There is someone waiting for him at the end of this path.
Why would anyone be waiting for him?
His coworkers, his family, Elena... None of them knew about his plan.
Aside from him, there should be no one who knows this place.
You're here at last, Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I've been waiting entire minutes.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Ho'olheyak.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I never expected... *cough*... that the last person to help me would be a mercenary.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You aren't here to help me.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Then—Why not pull the trigger already?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Relax, Ferdinand. I'm not here to kill you either.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I'm not sure I believe that.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The colonel... The army wants me silenced. I'm sure of it.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: And Kirsten wants me locked up... I'd turn crazy like Loken Williams if I ended up in prison. Either that, or I would have to roll over and rot away as a corpse.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Mad scientists are hardly a strange sight here in Columbia, but it's not like the military or the government could shoulder the infamy that comes with sacrificing civilians in evil experiments.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I have no idea... how Kirsten caught wind of what's going on in the site so easily or how she managed to convince the bureaucrats in the government in such a short amount of time...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: It's you.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You are no normal mercenary. You are a spy... Did the government send you? Who do you work for?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Shh, let's not waste our breath on all that.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: In Columbia, men like you can't hide anything, not even escape routes that look so discreet on the surface.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: He watches as the woman in front of him walks closer. A chill runs down his spine.
Not even the conversation he had with Kirsten a few minutes ago made him despair.
Yet, right now, with the Liberi reaching her hand out toward him, an extreme pain rushes up from his stomach and claws at his throat—
He almost vomits on the spot.
Look how messy your hair is, Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: It would ruin your image if you went out like this.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Right, you might want to know that I've already torn your getaway car to pieces.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: But you just made a very smart choice.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You could've dragged Kirsten and Rhine Lab down with you, but you didn't.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You do actually care as much about Rhine Lab as you said... You made sure that there is still hope for everyone in the future, even if that future doesn't necessarily include you.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: So... Right, I'll say it how you like to say it.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I forgive you.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Walk forward about another ten yards. There's a suit of power armor in the firefighting cabinet.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: —The newest kind.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You can wear it. You can control it remotely. You can even ignore it. It's your call.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Even though you can never come back to Trimounts... and it'd be in your best interest to stay away from other nomadic cities, there are still vaster lands waiting for you.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Now hop to it—
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: —'Pioneer.'
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak
